metadata.title: CVE-2020-9497 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Apache Guacamole 1.1.0 and older do not properly validate datareceived fromRDP servers via static virtual channels. If a userconnects to a maliciousor compromised RDP server, specially-craftedPDUs could result in disclosureof information within the memory ofthe guacd process handling theconnection.

criterions.comment: guacamole-client: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
